mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT RC.RCNMT_NO , RD.REQ_NO , RC.RCNMT_DT , RC.RCMNT_CN , EMP_PW FROM REQ_BOARD RD LEFT OUTER JOIN REQ_CMNT RC ON (RD.REQ_NO = RC.REQ_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(RD.EMP_CD = E.EMP_CD) where RC.RCNMT_NO is not null and rd.req_no = #{reqNo} ORDER BY RC.RCNMT_DT DESC ) B
mapper.delete: delete req_cmnt where rcnmt_no = #{rcnmtNo} and req_no = #{reqNo}
